scripts.install:all: npm i && cd ./backend && npm i && cd ../frontend && npm i
scripts.servers: sudo docker compose -f docker-compose.yaml -f docker-compose.local.yaml up --build
scripts.servers:db: sudo docker compose -f docker-compose.yaml -f docker-compose.local.yaml up -d db --build
scripts.servers:backend: sudo docker compose -f docker-compose.yaml -f docker-compose.local.yaml up -d db backend --build
scripts.servers:frontend: sudo docker compose -f docker-compose.yaml -f docker-compose.local.yaml up -d frontend --build
